body: It‘s better to have a clear roadmap like how to treat the old version acl.

> It‘s better to have a clear roadmap like how to treat the old version acl.

The old version acl will be removed soon, It is good idea to deprecated at enableAcl config.

body:
> 是说压测 1000 条会有 10 条消费重复吗？

是这样的，执行本地事务TransactionListenerImpl成功返回LocalTransactionState.COMMIT_MESSAGE; 消费者进行消息了，消费也成功了。 但过一会这条消息又被回查了（又走了回查方法了），消费者又消费了一次。

body: 你可以点击页面的 编辑此页，然后pr进行对应的修改 https://github.com/apache/rocketmq-site/blob/new-official-website/docs/02-producer/02message1.md

Since the consumption progress is synchronized every 10 seconds, if this mechanism does not change, in theory, repeated consumption will occur as long as a master-slave switch occurs. A synchronization mechanism may be needed to ensure that the consumption progress is synchronized.

> Please provide a easily reproducible set of steps, including the deployment structure and how to execute them to trigger this issue.

@leizhiyuan The reproduction method is very simple, just send someMessages.Then stop sending.You will find that even if you no longer send messages, the value will not change.

> Since the consumption progress is synchronized every 10 seconds, if this mechanism does not change, in theory, repeated consumption will occur as long as a master-slave switch occurs. A synchronization mechanism may be needed to ensure that the consumption progress is synchronized.

Actually the consumption synchronization period is modified to 3s in latest code, so that the repeated consumption you mentioned should decrease a lot. To reduce the remaining repeat, #7901 now explicitly call syncAll after register broker infomation.
It works well by add "-t topicName"

```
./mqadmin consumerConnection -n IP:9876  -g GROUP
```
Always generates %RETRY%{GROUP}_{TOPIC}, never %RETRY%{GROUP}

An error will still be reported, and no -t is available.

body:
> > 是说压测 1000 条会有 10 条消费重复吗？
> 
> 是这样的，执行本地事务TransactionListenerImpl成功返回LocalTransactionState.COMMIT_MESSAGE; 消费者进行消息了，消费也成功了。 但过一会这条消息又被回查了（又走了回查方法了），消费者又消费了一次。

可以通过 transaction.log 分析下半消息的事务处理情况，看下是否有异常日志

嗯嗯，一般来说不会。但如果naxNum不是很大，而是特别特别大。比如maxNum是int的极大值，那20亿来说吧，不超过int范围。内存不大的情况下就有可能oom。MQ机器应该不会分配很大内存的机器吧。
![image](https://github.com/apache/rocketmq/assets/53215912/93587d9c-eac3-4903-8d79-51302062f2aa)
``` java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: Requested array size exceeds VM limit at java.util.ArrayList.(ArrayList.java:153) ``` 嗯， 看上去是的
可以提个pr，修复一下

> Check if the expected behavior is consistent with what is described here.
> 
> https://github.com/apache/rocketmq/pull/7965/files

It is consistent. In fact, this change aligns with the binarySearchInQueueByTime method in ConsumeQueue. Regarding the input of LOWER or UPPER, we should pass LOWER when searching for messages at the start time, and pass UPPER when searching for messages at the end time. The description in the main text about this part has been updated.

body: ping @lollipopjin for review
I am interested in this problem, please assign it to me

> Do we need to consider the logic of "auto create subscription" here?

IMO, no impacts. The logic of "auto create subscription" is handled when the client sending a heartbeat for the first time, before the client actually receives some messages. So if an updateConusmerOffset request needs to be processed, the consumer group must have been created.
